Accession	Q6ZMP0;B2RTY3;B4DR13;Q6MZI3;Q6UXZ8;Q9H8E4
EntryName	THSD4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Thrombospondin type-1 domain-containing protein 4 (A disintegrin and metalloproteinase with thrombospondin motifs-like protein 6) (ADAMTS-like protein 6) (ADAMTSL-6)
GeneName	THSD4 UNQ9334/PRO34005
Length	219
Function	Promotes FBN1 matrix assembly. Attenuates TGFB signaling, possibly by accelerating the sequestration of large latent complexes of TGFB or active TGFB by FBN1 microfibril assembly, thereby negatively regulating the expression of TGFB regulatory targets, such as POSTN.
Subcellular Location	Secreted; Extracellular space; Extracellular matrix
